job.name: Nightlies
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc # setenv STARFPE NO cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} echo $INPUTFILE0 echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' set f = 1 if (! $?) then set chain = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set dir = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set log = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else exit 1; endif if (! -d $dir) mkdir -p $dir cd $dir; source ~/bin/SetVersion.csh set logFile = ${log}.log if (-r $logFile) exit 0; setenv StarEndMakerShell set exec = "root4star" echo $chain | grep '\.RC\.' if (! $?) set exec = "root.exe" ${exec} -q -b -x 'bfc.C('$f','$l',"'$chain',Sti")' >& ${logFile}
